description:
Show off your true colors with our prAna Pride Mountain Short Sleeve Tee. Part of our bestselling prAna Basics collection, this versatile style is Fair Trade Certified™, meaning the breathably soft organic cotton and the facility it was made in are approved by Fair Trade USA.

And with a classic fit and an oh-so-easy to wear feel, don't be surprised if you find yourself working this tee into your weekly wardrobe in no time.
name: Prana prAna Pride Mountain SS Tee - Mens
